FS.title: Tech. Franco Garcia
FS.content: I am Franco Garc√≠a, a University Technician in Programming with a B2 level of English. During the two years of my technical degree, I delve into backend technologies, with a focus on .NET., and Frontend, developed in React

AM.title: About me
AM.content_One: Hi, I'm Franco Garcia, 30 years old, and I'm from Argentina.
AM.content_Two: Although my practical experience is limited, I'm committed to continuing to specialize in FullStack development and applying the best practices learned in my training.

frontend.title: Cine App
frontend.content: Website for movies and series, as well as trends in both sections.

frontend.title: Task Minder 1.0
frontend.content: First version of an optional project where we started to implement a project similar to Trello or Jira

backend.title: Backend Task Minder + JWT + SQLite
content: Backend for Task Minder 1.0 built with layered architecture and various patterns, DTO, mappers, etc.
- Service Layer, Repository, and DTO pattern.
- AutoMapper for efficient mapping of DTOs to models.

backend.title: Backend Task Minder 2.0
content: The backend for Task Minder 2.0 is designed with a layered architecture and uses various dependencies to provide key functionalities:
- ORM para bases de datos: Uso de Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.
- Task Scheduling: Integration with Quartz for running background jobs.
- API Documentation: Generating documentation with Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.
- Unit Testing: Implementing tests with xUnit and Moq to ensure code quality.
